Name: Raspberry Lassi Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered raspberries and black pepper.
MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with skewered raspberry and dust with freshly ground black pepper.
Review: Rich creamy vanilla yoghurt with fresh raspberries and raspberry liqueur fortified with vodka.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
